q_en: What are the raw materials with non zero inventory in all of our warehouses, organized in the form of 'Type: Remaining Quantity'?

steps.sql: SELECT m.type, SUM(wm.left_number) AS remaining_quantity FROM warehouse_material wm JOIN materials m ON wm.material_id = m.id WHERE wm.left_number > 0 GROUP BY m.type;
steps.description: To find the raw materials with non-zero inventory in all warehouses, we need to select the material type and the sum of the remaining quantity for each material type where the remaining quantity is greater than zero. We will group the results by material type.

response:
Sure thing! Let's take a look at the raw materials with non-zero inventory in all of our warehouses. Here's the organized list in the form of 'Type: Remaining Quantity':

| Type   | Remaining Quantity |
|--------|--------------------|
| WIP    | 18,130             |
| Origin | 21,350             |

These are the materials that are currently stocked up in our warehouses. If you have any more questions or need further details, feel free to ask! ðŸ˜Š
